channel.title: We're Back! Grim's Hallow l NEW l 5/5/13 l 728/742 Try Now#@!#@!@#!
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Hello Moparians, Im tx577, Mod of Grim's Hallow and Im here to announce that we are a new server in search of new members!!!!!!!!! ""[/size]
[size=12pt]The Servers Owner [u][b]"Deathdomain"[/b][/u] is doing a promotion of the first 4 people get a weapon that is otherwise hard to obtain without right means.[/size]
[size=12pt]You Have A Input On New Changes and Things You Would Like To See!!!!![/size]
[size=12pt]Features:l
Friendly Staff and Owner's Staff Positions Available GWD Nex Friendly staff!! Jadinko Dungeon!! Ganodermic Beasts Custom Home!! Qbd!! Kbd!! Donaterzone!! no lag!! Tormented Demons!! Corp!! Glacors!! Avatar of Destruction!! wildywyrms!! Clan wars!! Duel Arena!! Castle Wars! Barrows!! fight pits!! Dominion Tower!! Zombies!! Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves) Fully working Fight Kiln Full Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes Unique custom made home Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends Great Economy Full Squeal of Fortune! Rewritten price loading using Enum All pets working All 25 Skill Working!!!! Crucible also fully working! All GodWars bosses! Full QBD and KBD No lag or memory leaks. No dupes. All Aura's Working with Wings and stuff And a shit load of other stuff!!!
Sorry for no pictures though, will be uploading some soon!!!! :),
[b]Training Area!!! (other talk to Grampa Jack at home)[/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img707/4865/trainingpic.png[/img] [b]Queen Black Dragon!!!!![/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/8260/qbd.png[/img] [b]NEX!!![/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img850/3772/nexpic.png[/img] [b]Fully Working GWD!!![/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img89/3773/godwarspic.png[/img] [b]Working Dominion Tower!!!![/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img19/6514/dominiontowerpic.png[/img] [b]Temp Custom Home!!!! (looking at new places)[/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/9210/customhome.png[/img] [b]Avatar!!!![/b] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/2337/avatrpic.png[/img]
GO TO http://www.grimshallow.webs.com
Also, before you play, make a account on the forums just in case accounts ever get erased owner could retrieve them, thanks :)
(once your on the website, click on client download, webclient coming soon!!
Staff open Also Client download. http://www.uppit.com/43u9kcxkpfuf/Grim's_Hallow2.jar
please no flame, but, if you do wish to flame then love off.
So yeah, join now if interested!!!!!!!!
[/size]

item.title: We're Back! Grim's Hallow l NEW l 5/5/13 l 728/742 Try Now#@!#@!@#!
item.dc:creator: @Deathdomain Deathdomain
item.description:
@Deathdomain wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:41, topic:486627”][quote author=Deathdomain link=topic=604863.msg4239634#msg4239634 date=1361746647]

btw we dont have g.e we just get items and sell to npc or other characters.

ur retarded

no just smart. g.e has too many dupes so if anyone is retarded that would be u
[/quote]

GOD DAMN IT WHY WOULD YOU EVEN SAY THAT

FAKEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE :mad:[/quote]

Im sorry you feel that way but im currently re-doing the whole server, just looking for help right now and the person who posted this thread is no longer with us, if you would like to help you can if not please just try and give insite to things that you can help with.

Read full topic
